title: RevoAI Launches Bank 5.0 at GITEX Global Dubai 2025: AI-Blockchain Synergy Power the Next Banking Revolution
description: United States, October 29, 2025 -- GITEX GLOBAL 2025 successfully concluded its edition as the world's largest and most influential technology event, held in Dubai from October 13th to 17th, 2025. The event served as a definitive platform, showcasing the most transformative breakthroughs in Artificial Intelligence, digital solutions, quantum computing, and biotechnology. By uniting established tech enterprises, visionary investors, pioneering startups, and leading experts, it fostered an unparalleled environment for connection, collaboration, and shaping the next chapter of global technology. Since its inception in 1981, GITEX has unequivocally evolved into the world's most comprehensive technology ecosystem.

title: US, South Korea to sign tech pact
description: President Donald Trump's administration is slated to sign a deal with South Korea aimed at bolstering cooperation in artificial intelligence, quantum computing and data speeds, according to a U.S. official -- part of a bid to maintain a competitive edge with China in an expanding race for tech supremacy.
content: President Donald Trump's administration is slated to sign a deal with South Korea aimed at bolstering cooperation in artificial intelligence, quantum computing and data speeds, according to a U.S. official -- part of a bid to maintain a competitive e... [7142 chars]

title: Would YOU let AI spend your money? Two in five households would hand over shopping and paying bills
description: A significant number of Britons would let artificial intelligence spend their money if it meant they could avoid routine jobs, new research reveals.
content:
Two in five Britons would let artificial intelligence spend their money if it meant they could avoid routine jobs like shopping and paying bills, new research reveals.
Many households are already using AI for menial tasks like recipe ideas, schedule ... [2408 chars]

title: As Amazon fires 14,000 people, is AI already taking away human jobs?
description: E-commerce major Amazon has confirmed that it will hand pink slips to at least 14,000 people, with more job cuts expected in the coming year, in a major shakeup driven in part by adoption of artificial intelligence (AI). At least 1,000 Indian workers of the company are likely to be impacted by the layoffs. The […]
content: Announcing the fresh round of layoffs Tuesday, Beth Galetti, Senior Vice President of People Experience and Technology at Amazon, said, “This generation of AI is the most transformative technology we’ve seen since the Internet, and it’s enabling comp... [4114 chars]

title: US sets $80B nuclear reactor deal
description: The Trump administration will take a stake in at least $80 billion of new nuclear reactors that it sees as key to continuing to develop artificial intelligence technologies through a deal it inked with the parent companies of nuclear developer Westinghouse.

title: Saudi AI chief vows to avoid Huawei tech in bid for U.S. chips
description: Tareq Amin, the head of Saudi Arabia’s artificial intelligence startup Humain, is confident the U.S. will clear the sale of advanced chips to the kingdom.
content:
Tareq Amin, the head of Saudi Arabia’s artificial intelligence startup Humain, said he is confident the U.S. will clear the sale of advanced chips to the kingdom after his firm provided detailed guarantees to American officials.

title: Radaris Launches AI-Powered People Search Platform to Help Americans Reconnect in a Disconnected Age
description: NEWTON, Mass., Oct. 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- One of the leading data intelligence services for people and companies on the market, Radaris, has made an announcement about the upcoming release of an AI-powered people search platform. The platform is capable of analyzing different fragments of information, like the address, the town or the name, using semantic search powered by artificial intelligence and piecing together the info by comparing it with other entries to generate accurate and context-based matches.

title: Indian envoy Kwatra discusses hydrocarbons trade, AI, counter-terrorism with key US Senator
description: India's Ambassador to the US, Vinay Mohan Kwatra, met with Senator Jacky Rosen. They discussed boosting trade in hydrocarbons and cooperation in Artificial Intelligence. Counter-terrorism efforts were also a key topic. This comes as trade negotiations between India and the US are nearing a conclusion. Both nations are working towards a bilateral trade deal.

title: Stocks Get AI Boost Before Earnings, Fed Decision: Markets Wrap
description: Asian indexes advanced on optimism that artificial intelligence will continue to drive profits at megacap technology companies reporting earnings this week, amid growing bets on a Federal Reserve interest-rate cut. MSCI’s regional stock index rose 0.4%, with the tech sector outperforming and chip-related stocks such as SK Hynix Inc. and Advantest Corp. jumping after strong earnings.
content:

title: Natural Gas: A Permanent Player in the Energy Arena
description: Natural gas, once considered merely a transitional fuel, is now seen as a permanent element in the energy landscape, according to Ashraf Al Ghazzawi of Saudi Aramco. He noted that natural gas is crucial in supporting the growth driven by artificial intelligence demand.
